We have been executing various State and Central Government Sponsored Placement Linked Training programs for the several years, across West Bengal, Bihar, Jharkhand, Odisha and Uttar Pradesh based on MES / QPNOS Syllabus & Guidelines. Our company also won the Rashtrya Udyog Ratna Award by National Education & Human Resource Development Organisation as well as Winner of Quality Brands (2012-2104) by Quality Brand Times.

utilisation had been done in the said tribal dominated village Kankutia of Birbhum Local youths of the community had prepare a map of the water resources livestock map seasonality of the existing livestock diseases Plantation census and posibilities of further plantation etc Awareness offish culture with scientific knowledge among tribal fishers with keeping their traditional practices in tact had been developed Periodical Veterinary health camp had regular been conducted in colaboration with Block ARDD GoWB to protect the existing livestock Regularly observation of World Environment Day and awareness on environment protection organising camp and through distribution and plantation of fruit trees in villages to combat with the climate change A periodical survey is conducted to monitor its survivality Capacity building on aquaculture agriculture animal husbandry group mobilisation participatory resource mapping is going on through the years by the way of group meeting awareness programmes sharing of experiences from different areas and also by the way of demonstration LIFE had been organising medical camps which received unexpectedly overwhelming response from the villagers of Kankutia a tribal dominated village of Birbhum in West Bengal The objectives of this camps were to identify and ascertain at a very besic level the predominent health issues of the village as well as to assess the awareness level of its inhabitants reputed doctors along with the LIFE team including local volunteers visited the village to conduct a health survey while the camp s were in progress LIFE celebrets the Joy of Giving every years by making gift of Cloths to the marginalised and vernerable people of different age sex race and cast of that village at the eve of SARODOTSAV so that every villagers can participate the forthcoming largest festival of the Begali people with new cloths according to the ritual A large number of villagers along with the distinguish members from LIFE and PRs from Gram Panchyat Panchyat Samiti and Zilla Parishad participate in the programme to witness the smiling faces of the boys girls men and wemen of the community with the new gifted cloths These were possible only due to support from our well wishers LIFE in accordence with its vision has started to organise football tournament among the nebouring youth from this year That tournament was dedicated to the memories of our respected founder president Prof Anil kumar Sarkar

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: The signature project of the hospital is Lions Seva Eye Hospital - a 40 bedded hospsital housed in its own G plus 4 building. Fully modernised and well equipped air-conditioned Outpatient Department. Ther are two separate OT viz- one for general surgery of eye diseases including cataract and the other is septic OT. Separate ward for male and female patients. Facilities include Phaco surgery, micro-surgery, Glaucoma, Lid surgery, Squint, DCT etc. Average OPD visit is around 110 and annual outturn is 25600. Surgical performance is around 3500 nos.Hospital has separate project for providing Dental services to the people. Dental section is fully modernised. A pathological laboratory is also running under name and style SEVA Diagnnostic Centre. Average daily visit is 27 patientts.

Lions Club of Raniganj has taken a project for expansion of Raniganj Lions JDMC DAV Public School anticipating direct benefit of more than four hundred families of this locality. This Higher Secondary school started in collaboration with DAV, New Delhi where every year we were denying more than four hundred students of the locality due to paucity of class rooms. We intended to construct seven class rooms with other facilities to serve more people. First phase of the project has been completed.

Second phase for expansion of Raniganj Lions JDMC DAV Public School has been completed. Seven class rooms with drinking water space and teachers room constructed and furniture also been procured. We may cater the entire eastern cold field area in the district of Purba and Paschim Bardhaman, Bankura and Birbhum partly and adjacent district of Jharkhand state. Student with both Below poverty line and well to do communities will be benefited from this projects to build up there career initially.

ngoList.title: LITTLE THESPIAN

members.name: Dr S M Azhar Alam S M Azhar Alam

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: All activities of Little Thespian are directly or indirectly related to the development of theatre art and how to take theatre to the masses. Over the years we have produced all forms of theatre be it realistic, classics, intimate, street, children,s theatre, story theatre, one-act-play, short skits etc. which bring to the forefront the various vices found in our society and make people sit up and take notice. All this we for this we have formulated a very well focused annual agenda where by have pledged to work for the development of theatre art by Producing Plays in Hindi/Urdu, Producing Story Theatre and Organizing Theatre workshop. Apart from this Little Thespian tries its level best to promote theatre in languages other than Hindi/Urdu. It has produced plays in Nepali (Raksi ko Srishti Karta & Hayavadana) and in Bengali (Shesher Raatri by Tagore) ACHIVEMENT: Our achivement lie in the fact that 1. we have created a wide circle of theatre audience which in todays time is totally unheard of, especially for Urdu/Hindi theatre in Kolkata. 2. In our own way we have been able to take theatre art to the masses. 3. the Ministry of Culture, Govt. of India has recognized our effort and hard work and granted us a Salary Grant of ten Artistes, and two of our artists junior fellowship in the field of theatre. 4. Little Thespian has made its presence felt in all the major theatre festivals organized in India be it the festivals organized by the different zonal centres such as NZCC, WZCC, EZCC etc. or the festivals organized by NSD, Sangeet Natak Akademi, Nandikar Theatre Festival, Qadir Ali Baig Theatre Festival etc. Little Thespian is not only concerned with the development of theatre it is also very much concerned with the enrichment of Urdu and Hindi literature. For this it translates/transliterates stories and plays from other language to Urdu and Hindi as the case may be.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: We are organizing Rogi Sahayata Kendra, PC PNDT activities, Medical camp and low cost poly clinic and Ambulances services For providing technical education to the unemployed youths we are organising a sort term vocational training centre under GoWB. We are also organising courses under moduler employable scheme of GoI. Recently we organised different training courses under the guidance and financial support from following organisations Handloom Training by Ministry of Youth Affairs, GOI, Freshwater Pearl Culture Training by DST, GoWB, Biodegradable Bag Preparation by Environment Department, GoWB, Bee Keeping by Horticulture Dept, GoWB. Currently nine hundred women are enlisted with our Sanchyaka Prakalpa with their Micro Savings. Twenty one SHGs are active under NABARD. We are regularly participating in National Environmental Activities under Min Environment and Forests GoI and organise different environmental activities under the guidance of WB Pollution Control Board and WB Biodiversity Board. With our youth members we organise national integration camp and career counseling camp. We are organising different programmes for Consumer Awareness with Consumer Affairs Dept, GoWB. Trafficking, etc. Since last twenty four years we are reqularly publishing the Bengali journal Sundarban Alekhya. For our activities we achieved Meghnad Award from DST, GoWB Environment Excellence Award from WBPCB, Best Youth Organisation of the District by NYK and in NEAC we stood first, seconc, third amongst the NGOs of west Bengal in different years

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: The Lokayata Sanskriti Parishat a voluntary organization, is working among the Tribal/Non-tribal backward castes people of adjoining areas of West Bengal, Bihar, and Orissa since its inception in 1973, Although being as a cultural organization, its spies of activities is spreading day by day. This organization in its Socio-cultural front acquired tremendous reputation as a plat from of social awareness and development among the down  trodden masses in the region. In its cultural front, its has under taken various programme on picking up sere and almost extinct types of dances in Adivasi ( S.T./S.C.) community. It also organized UTSAV to bring the richness of the Tribals and other low castes cultural limelight.

ngoList.title: MAKHLA SHINJINI
ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Makhla Shinjini, a centre for promoting Indian Art and Culture engaged in teaching dances - classical, Folk, Rabindrik nritya, Nazrul nritya, old classical filmi dances etc, in the subarban town Uttarpara, Hooghly, West Bengal. Its mile stone started in the year 1985 when it was not registered in this name and it is registered with Government of West Bengal and affiliated with Pracheen Kala Kendra as an "Examination Centre". Since its inception, Makhla Shinjini holding different activities round the year. The name of some activities are - "Guru-Shishya parampara ; Lecture demonstration ; Dance workshop ; In-house dance meet ; Basanta-Utsav ;Holding dance competition ; Social work i.e. strengthening human values of children through dances ; Social awareness programme ; holding variuous types of choreographic dance production and usual dance programme ; etc. Choreographis dance presentation of Makhla Shinjini includes : MUKTI ; EVOLUTION OF KATHAK ; JIWANJANTRANATE DRUG ; HUMANE DRAUPADI ; MEERABAI ; KAM-KANDALA-PART I & II ; WOMEN - PAST & PRESENT ; BIRPURUSH ; BHARATTIRTHA ; STREAM OF LIFE ; SEA SHORE ; GOBARDHAN LEELA ; ETC

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: MallabhumManbhum Educational Trust is a register under the Indian Trust Act, 1882 was formed on 06.09.2012,having its register office at 2A/13,Aryabhatta Road, Durgapur, Pin-713205, have stared its operation in 2012. Mission of trust is to promote, technical & skill training along with advance technical knowledge in respective field to the young youths along with socio-economic development of the rural region. At present we have set up Manbhum Private Iti, atVill. & Po. Mautorh, PS: Raghunathpur 2, Dt. Purulia. Pin: 723145.Having own campus. This area has some big running projects like D.V.C.,Cement Plant, Santaldhi Thermal Plant, ACC Cement Plant, etc. situated in this zone. So there is massive job opportunity for the students of this backwarddistrict. As this place do not have the advance skill development so we have set up this ItI, to give them the technical knowledge and get employment. Our trustee members are eminent personnel of our society and are technically sound in this field are mostly from educational field NITs, from steel industry, mining industry, financial & civil branches, etc. The institute have got the approval of NCVT,New Delhi,affiliation no: DGT-6/25/2015-TC ,for two running trades Electrician 6(2+2+2) & Fitter courses 3(1+1+1) last year. Due to huge demand in this field this year (2016) we had to increase these trades by 3(1+1+1) & 6(2+2+2) respectively with 3 shifts in each unit.
